title: Blended EAP Short-Term Course for Strengthening Collaborative Academic Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Non-degree educational program for mathematics domain managers/leaders, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Collaborating with peers, learners can draft an outline for a mathematical academic document with over 80% completeness.
By analyzing Automated Writing Evaluation (AWE) feedback at least three times, learners can propose two or more improvements during peer review.
Using online collaboration tools, learners can complete group draft revisions of academic papers with over 90% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
